item.title: CNHI
item.description: score:247 Chances: CNH Industrial NV’s partnership with the Catholic University of Cordoba (UCC) to educate Argentina’s next generation of farmers demonstrates their commitment to investing in future growth and innovation. The company’s ongoing recognition and awards for farming innovations from their global agriculture brands, Case IH and New Holland, indicate a strong track record of product development and customer-inspired solutions.
